column1: Hey.  I think I see something down the hill.
Besides, if our bikes get wet, their chains'll rust.
Aw man, now we'll never see the hot action.
Your mom has the sweetest bewbs ever.
Hey, hold on a second!  These are like the hottest tits I've ever seen!
Give me that!  Whoa! I knew she had a hot rack!
I get to take the picture behind the bushes after you.
I'm taking them to the bushes first!
